It interests the player from the beginning and stays like that to its final minutes. It entertains with great, humorous dialogue, intrigues with compelling puzzles - as a result you keep staring at the screen and forget about the world around you. Challenging puzzles for previous players as well as new players. This game is also a well-written product with great attention to detail. Humorous and fun. I enjoyed every level of this game (and the satisfying conclusion). I can't think of a way that Valve could have made it better.
great
I wish you guys still made videogames

Overall an amazing game. The writing, the graphics, the characters, the gameplay, everything about this game is great. If you liked the original, you will love this game. The original Portal is great, but it kinda had just a half story. Portal 2, however, not only fully explains the story of the first game, but also tells a new story, and even shows you what happened decades before the original took place. This is a rare case where the sequel is better than the original. Very much recommend that you play this game. 10/10

It is Portal 2, a massive improvement over the first (but WAIT, you should have the first as well), everything about this game is amazing, this game speaks for itself, good graphics, good mechanics, good story (no spoilers). Again, you should get both games, just a great game. Recommending this is a understatement.

A rather exquisite classic for both single player and co-op.

Play the single player to challenge your thought process.

Play the co-op to throw all that single player godlike status into the trash and realize your friend is much better than you at solving puzzles.

Later edit, after finishing the campaign: the single player only strengthens Portal's status as a classic. An absolute achievement for the gaming industry.

Even later edit: my friend keeps screenshoting my review in order to flex the fact that I'm ass at puzzle games. That being said, [spoiler]să-ți trag la muie[/spoiler].

最近终于把Portal2的单人剧情通关了。不得不说作为V社的经典解密游戏，传送门的思路做得确实很赞，GlaDos姐也是十分令人喜爱。最后一幕上月球的确是游戏设计师的脑洞大开，点个赞，十分佩服。另外主角可真是强啊，直接暴露在太空中都跟没事人一样，自由落体也死不了，不愧是主角。

Первая часть игры была хороша, ты с помощью порталов решаешь головоломки, пытаешься понять, что же всё таки здесь произошло, а вторая часть взяла всё хорошее, что было у первой и приумножила это в разы. Очень много нововведений: гели, кубы, шары, мосты и это лишь малая часть того, что было добавлено во вторую часть этой замечательной серии. Персонажи стали более весёлыми и человечными ( одни только шуточки GLaDOS на протяжении всей игры чего стоят). В общем игра прекрасна и в неё хочется играть снова и снова.

El vacío existencial que me ha dejado es maravilloso.
